actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize a suitability and feasibility study of designating the home of President Benjamin Harrison as a unit of the National Park System.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to conduct a suitability and feasibility study of designating the home of President Benjamin Harrison at 1230 North Delaware Street, Indianapolis, Indiana, as a unit of the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize a suitability and feasibility study of designating the home of President Benjamin Harrison as a unit of the National Park System.
